verbs.description: [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: showed] up [ARGM-TMP: nearly 20 minutes late] [C-ARG1: to a session on gender equality] [ARGM-LOC: at the G7 summit] and at times appeared to be " dozing off . "
